verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fanahy Masina ô,
Ovay ny fiainako
Hanana ny fitiavanao
Hanao ny asanao

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fanahy Masina ô,
Diovy ny foko
Hiray safidy Aminao
Hiaritra toloko.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fanahy Masina ô,
Raiso aho ho Anao
Ka amin'ilay afonao
Hafanao mba hanao.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Fanahy Masina ô,
Akambano izahay
Mba hiray hina ho Anao
Anio mandrakizay.
